00039 class Spu {
00040     public:
00048         static inline void
00049         init(unsigned long long &argv, unsigned long long &envp)
00050         {
00051             ::ctk_env_init(&envp);
00052         }
00053 
00060         static inline ctk_uint64_t getGroupId() {
00061             return ::ctk_env_get_gid();
00062         }
00063 
00070         static inline ctk_uint32_t getRank() {
00071             return ::ctk_env_get_rank();
00072         }
00073 
00079         static inline void sleep(unsigned long sec) {
00080             ::ctk_sleep(sec);
00081         }
00082 
00088         static inline void usleep(unsigned long sec) {
00089             ::ctk_usleep(sec);
00090         }
00091 };
